dmca.title: Claim that blog violates court-ordered settlement
dmca.body:
Google received a court-endorsed Judgment from American Tower Corporation
regarding content on the following site:

christopher-king.blogspot.com

Content on this blog are in direct violation to the settlement terms in
Christopher King vs. American Tower Corporation.

--

UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT 
DISTRICT OF MASSACHUSETTS 
CHRISTOPHER KING, 
Plaintiff 
V. CIVIL ACTION NO. 03-10904-RCL 
AMERICAN TOWER CORPORATION, 
JOELLEN MITCHELL and YANNIS 
MACHERAS, 
Defendants 

The parties in the above-captioned matter hereby agree as follows: 
1. Judgment shall enter for the defendants on all counts of the plaintiffs Complaint in this action. 
2. The defendants are hereby designated as the prevailing parties on all counts of the plaintiffs Complaint. 
3. The plaintiff waives all rights of appeal. 
4. Each party will bear his, her or its own costs.
